verses.roman:
candraśekhara kahe,--"prabhu, baḍa kṛpā kailā
āpane āsiyā bhṛtye daraśana dilā

synonyms: candraśekhara kahe—Candraśekhara said; prabhu—my dear Lord; baḍa kṛpā kailā—You have shown Your causeless mercy; āpane—personally; āsiyā—coming; bhṛtye—unto Your servant; daraśana dilā—gave Your audience.
translation: Candraśekhara said, "My dear Lord, You bestowed Your causeless mercy upon me because I am Your old servant. Indeed, You have come here personally to give me Your audience.
